name: Seiji Kameyama
description: {{Nihongo|'''Seiji Kameyama'''|亀山晴児|Kameyama Seiji|born on August 10, 1979}}, better known by his stage name '''Wise''', is a [[Japanese rap|rapper]] who raps in both English and Japanese. His mother is American and his father is Japanese and during high school, he lived in the United States. He is affiliated with the creative group Kazenohito. In 2005, he formed the group Wise'N'SonPub with beatmaker SonPub and the group [[Teriyaki Boyz]] with Ryo-Z, Ilmari (from [[Rip Slyme]]) and Verbal (from [[M-Flo]]). He made his major debut as a solo artist with the single "Shine Like a Star" on February 21, 2007.
